document_data.name: Glondar
document_data.mainbody: '''Glondar''' was a [[Zhentilar]] of the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He was part of a squad led by [[Fimril]].
document_data.History: In late {{yearlink|1357}}, Glondar was part of the squad led by [[Fimril]] that briefly captured [[Shandril Shessair]] at [[Hullack Forest]]. He was slain by [[Mirt]], who came to her rescue.
